publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-689# Marilyn Livingstone: Safe Drive - Stay Alive Roadshow-That the Parliament congratulates Fife's emergency services and the Fife Road Safety Unit on the ground-breaking road safety venture Safe Drive - Stay Alive; recognises the pivotal role played by Fife firemaster Mike Bitcom and his staff in organising the three-day event; acknowledges that over 4,000 fifth year pupils attended from all over the Kingdom, and believes that other local authorities should consider similar events as a means of introducing novice drivers to the real-life consequences of road traffic accidents. Supported by: Bill Butler*
S2M-689# Safe Drive - Stay Alive Roadshow (lodged on 2 December 2003) Tricia Marwick*
S2M-689# Safe Drive - Stay Alive Roadshow (lodged on 2 December 2003) Scott Barrie*

S2M-689# Marilyn Livingstone: Safe Drive - Stay Alive Roadshow-That the Parliament congratulates Fife's emergency services and the Fife Road Safety Unit on the ground-breaking road safety venture Safe Drive - Stay Alive; recognises the pivotal role played by Fife firemaster Mike Bitcom and his staff in organising the three-day event; acknowledges that over 4,000 fifth year pupils attended from all over the Kingdom, and believes that other local authorities should consider similar events as a means of introducing novice drivers to the real-life consequences of road traffic accidents. Supported by: Bill Butler, Tricia Marwick, Scott Barrie

S2M-689# Safe Drive - Stay Alive Roadshow (lodged on 2 December 2003) Richard Baker*, Christine May*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Jackie Baillie*, Sarah Boyack*, Carolyn Leckie*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Alex Neil*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Cathy Peattie*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Helen Eadie*
S2M-689# Safe Drive - Stay Alive Roadshow (lodged on 2 December 2003) Ms Sandra White*, Elaine Smith*, Iain Smith*
S2M-689# Safe Drive - Stay Alive Roadshow (lodged on 2 December 2003) Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-689# Safe Drive - Stay Alive Roadshow (lodged on 2 December 2003) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-689# Safe Drive - Stay Alive Roadshow (lodged on 2 December 2003) Donald Gorrie*, Eleanor Scott*
S2M-689# Safe Drive - Stay Alive Roadshow (lodged on 2 December 2003) Mr Kenny MacAskill*
